tool_description:
The API that contains all UFC fighters
Returns in JSON format. Each entry contains:
     first name, last name,  nickname, weight, weight class, height, reach,
     stance, wins, losses, draws, belt
name: UFC Fighters
title: UFC Fighters

api_list.name: get_champions
api_list.description: Get current champions of all weight classes in the UFC
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com/fighters/champions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com/fighters/champions"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_fighter_history
api_list.description:
Return a list of fights of the fighters
Each fight includes:
result, opponent, knockdowns, opponent knockdowns, strikes, opponent strikes, takedowns, opponent takedowns, submission attempts, opponent submission attemps, event, date, end method, end round, end time, whether it is a title fight.

api_list.name: get_fighter_advanced_stats
api_list.description: Get fighter advanced statswith query strings first_name and last_name (must be exact). You can search with the endpoint fighter_search if you are unsure.

api_list.name: get_random_fighter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com/fighters/data/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: fighter_search
api_list.description: Search for a fighter in the UFC, nicknames are also okay

api_list.name: get_rankings
api_list.description:
Get current rankings of fighters in the UFC
Available divisions:
    "Men's Pound-for-Pound"
    "Flyweight"
    "Bantamweight"
    "Featherweight"
    "Lightweight"
    "Welterweight"
    "Middleweight"
    "Light Heavyweight"
    "Heavyweight"
    "Women's Pound-for-Pound"
    "Women's Strawweight"
    "Women's Flyweight"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com/rankings/Lightweight"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com/rankings/{weight_class}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-fighters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
